column6:
The stunningly illustrated mini-series continues! In "Last Hunts and Massacres", the black-costumed Spidey, still reeling from the events of "Kraven's Last Hunt", joins an X-Men team rocked by the Mutant,2008,12
Massacre to face the deadly menace of the Marauders! Wolverine vs. Sabretooth? Check! Storm with a Mohawk? Check! All-out action as only Italian sensation Mario Alberti can deliver? Feast your eyes, true believer!
Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Mario Alberti | letterer:Jared Fletcher | writer:Christos Gage
